Entry.JapaneseText: すごくボロっちい橋だったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: That bridge was in pretty rough shape.

Entry.JapaneseText: 確かに古い橋だが、あの橋は古代カレギアの 偉人エトレーがミナールの人々と……
Entry.EnglishText: It is certainly an old bridge, but in ancient Callegea it is where the great man Etoray...

Entry.JapaneseText: かつてアルヴァン山脈のふもとに住んでいた人々を 和解させた由緒正しい場所だ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...settled a dispute between the peoples of Minal and a former settlement near the Alvan Mountains.
Entry.Notes: Line is split even in japanese.

Entry.JapaneseText: へえ、そうなんだ。だとしたら漆黒のヤツら、 結構大変なコトしちゃったんじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: Wow, really? If that's so, then the Dark trio really made a mess of things!
